attributes.additional_details: International power and economic growth. It would also bring economic benefits through a unified trade network, strengthen geopolitical influence, and foster cultural and technological exchange.
attributes.background: Build up military spending as to in the future take back some of the old British empire. We must first try to rebuild it through diplomatic means

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what specific action you'd like the Government or Parliament to carry out.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
